name: Fixer
Lore: 'Careful manipulator of funds and Imperial taxation codes. Buys droids from Jawas and sells them to the Alliance.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys -1 to same site as Camie. Once per turn, may use 1 Force to place a card from Crash Site Memorial in Used Pile. If Crash Site Memorial leaves table (except by your card), place all cards on it in Used Pile.',
